#sidebar UILibraryElements

=UI Message Element=

==Details==

The message element is meant to display various type of messages to the user. It supports color coded messaging for errors, warning or just to inform the user about a certain thing.

A message element is a {{{<div></div>}}} with the {{{xe-ui-message}}} class applied to it. It also need one of the following classes to skin it properly:
 * {{{error}}}
 * {{{info}}}
 * {{{warning}}}

==Examples==
An error message:
{{{
<div class="xe-ui-message error cleared">
	<a href="#" style="float: right;" onclick="jQuery(this).parent().remove();return false;" class="xe-ui-button-gray">Dismiss</a>
	<p>Cras elementum, tortor a egestas volutpat, nisi felis malesuada sapien, et congue leo justo a nulla. Nullam turpis justo, fringilla commodo sagittis nec, luctus imperdiet nibh. Ut eleifend tincidunt nunc et pretium. In ac purus a metus mattis iaculis. Duis sodales tortor nec nisl sodales hendrerit. Suspendisse pellentesque, libero at sodales condimentum, turpis dolor laoreet lorem, a vestibulum felis diam sed sapien. Integer a consequat turpis.</p>
</div>
}}}
